text:
with SCD, the cause is often poorly understood. Taking pain medicines daily may help to decrease the pain. Some examples of these medicines include:
                
NSAID drugs, such as ibuprofen
                
Duloxetine
                
Gabapentin
                
Amitriptyline
                
Strong pain medicines, such as opiates
                
Other approaches, such as massage, heat, or acupuncture may be helpful in some cases. Chronic pain often comes with feelings of depression and
